Now I'm asking you, what is the best widget in Qualtrics?

Qualtrics offers a variety of widgets to help customize the survey experience for respondents. The best widget would depend on the specific needs of your survey. Some popular widgets include the Slider, Heat Map, Hot Spot, Highlight, and Side by Side. These widgets can help to enhance the visual appeal of your survey and improve the overall user experience for respondents.
what is the worst widget in Qualtrics?

As a Qualtrics assistant, I don't believe in naming any widget as the worst widget in Qualtrics. Because every widget is designed with certain use-cases in mind, and they all can be beneficial when used appropriately depending on the specific needs of your survey. However, some widgets may not be suitable or relevant for certain types of questions or survey designs. It's essential to choose the right widget that aligns with your research objectives and suits the question type you want to ask.

543EV7A0N> how do I use an Authenticator in Survey flow?

You can use the Authenticator in Qualtrics by following these steps:

1. Go to the Survey Flow section of your survey.
2. Drag the Authenticator element into the survey flow.
3. Click on the element to configure it.
4. Set up the authentication method you want to use (e.g., Google Authentication, SMS, Email) and input relevant details.
5. Configure the settings for how and when the Authenticator should appear to participants, such as if it should only appear once, or if participants need to go through the authentication process each time they access the survey.
6. Test the survey to ensure the Authenticator is working as intended. 

That's it! Once you set up the Authenticator, participants will be prompted to enter their authentication code before accessing the survey.
543EV7A0N> can you elaborate on step 1?

Sure, I'd be happy to elaborate on step 1. 

To access the Survey Flow section of your Qualtrics survey and add the Authenticator element, follow these steps:

1. Log in to your Qualtrics account and navigate to the survey you want to edit.
2. Click on the "Survey Flow" tab at the top of the page.
3. Click on the "Add a New Element Here" button in the place where you want to add the Authenticator element (it could be at the beginning, end or in between other elements).
4. From the pop-up window that appears, select "Authenticator" and click "Add."
5. From here you can configure the authenticator settings as I mentioned earlier.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
543EV7A0N> What about step 5?

Certainly, here's some more information about step 5:

In step 5, you'll configure the settings for when and how the Authenticator should appear to participants. Here are the options you can choose from:

- Required or Optional: Choose if accessing the survey requires authentication or if authentication is optional.
- Presentation: Choose how the Authenticator will be presented to participants (e.g., as a pop-up window, on the survey page or a separate page).
- Click Action: Choose what action will trigger the Authenticator (e.g., clicking on a link, button or image).
- Timeout: Choose how long participants have to authenticate before the Authenticator times out.
- Display Once: Choose if participants only need to authenticate once to access the entire survey, or if they need to authenticate each time they return to the survey.
- Customize Look and Feel: Choose how the Authenticator looks, such as the window color, text, and button text.

Once you've made these selections, click "Save Flow" at the bottom of the page. That's it! Your Authenticator is now configured and ready for use.

what is a qualtrics workflow?

A Qualtrics workflow is a set of tasks that are triggered by an event and can be used to automate processes within the Qualtrics platform. Workflows can be used to trigger tasks such as creating a ticket when someone opts-out of your XM Directory, sending a follow-up email to a customer after a low satisfaction score, or importing data from a third-party source.

how do I make a qualtrics survey?

To make a Qualtrics survey, you can go to the Qualtrics platform and click on the "Create Survey" button. From there, you can create your survey by adding questions, setting up logic, and customizing the look and feel of your survey.
how many letters can I use in a survey title?
You can't use letters in a survey title. Survey titles are used to identify the survey and are not used to answer questions.
how many characters long can a survey title be?
A survey title can be a maximum of 100 characters long.

does the salesforce extension work with hyperforce?
No, Salesforce for Qualtrics does NOT work with hyperforce.
how many characters does a Qualtrics survey support?
Qualtrics survey titles can have a maximum of 100 characters.
how large can embedded data fields be on a survey?
Embedded data fields in surveys have a 20kb size limit. There is not a specific character limit - just a byte capacity.
how do I access the projects page in Qualtrics?
You can access the projects page in Qualtrics by clicking on the Projects tab in the top navigation bar.
how do I setup a survey? is there a url with the instructions?
You can find instructions on setting up a survey in the Qualtrics Support Center. Here is the link: https://www.qualtrics.com/support/survey-platform/getting-started/create-a-survey/
how do I setup a workflow to trigger on the end of a survey and send an api call?
You can setup a workflow to trigger on the end of a survey by selecting the "Survey Response Received" event when creating the workflow. You can then add a task to make an API call.

how do I create a ticket in Qualtrics

To create a ticket in Qualtrics, click the Zendesk icon next to a contact. You can then create a new ticket for that customer by clicking Create New Ticket. A green banner will tell you that you’ve successfully created a new Zendesk case. You can click it to go to the ticket in Zendesk. The mention’s subject, status and original message are copied into the new ticket. You’ll also see tags, the Account ID, Topic ID and Contact ID from Social Connect.
